item.title: Braillenote Touch vs Esytime - Part 1
item.description: A comparison (before hands-on) between Humanware’s Braillenote Touch and Eurobraille’s Esytime. Originally personal notes I created.

item.title: Braillenote Touch vs Esytime - Part 2
item.description: A comparison (after hands-on) between Humanware’s Braillenote Touch and Eurobraille’s Esytime. This is the second article in a two part series.
